review: Great game.  Very good use of episodic story telling, leaves you wanting more and hanging out for the next release.  Would recommend to anyone.

review: Your typical Batman game.  Not as great as Arkham Asylum but still a good solid game.  Has replayability in the form of challenge modes, I wish like most games the hardest difficulty was unlocked when you get the game, rather then when you finish the game.
